sources.title: Mutiny in Outer Space
sources.description: Title: Mutiny in Outer Space Summary: A creeping fungus starts killing off astronauts on a trip back from the moon. Directed by: Hugo Grimaldi, Arthur C. Pierce Actors: Production Company: Hugo Grimaldi Film Productions Release Date: 3 March 1965 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An expedition to the lunar ice caves contracts a deadly moon-fungus. Stopping en route they contaminate a space station with the fungus, which soon begins to take over the entire place.

metadata.Plot: The inhabitants of Ganymede need to find mates from another world or they will become extinct. They soon discover a suitable breeding stock amongst the females of planet Earth.
metadata.Actors: John Saxon, Maurice Denham, Patricia Haines
